Problem Statement.Description: The current process of publishing and sharing research papers is inefficient, leading to delays and missed opportunities for collaboration. The existing solutions lack a centralized platform for researchers to share their work, making it difficult to track and verify the authenticity of published papers.
Problem Statement.Impact: The lack of a centralized platform for research paper sharing can lead to missed opportunities for collaboration, delayed publishing, and potential inaccuracies in published papers.
Problem Statement.Challenges: The existing solutions lack a centralized platform for research paper sharing, making it difficult to track and verify the authenticity of published papers.
Problem Statement.Target Audience: Researchers, academics, and students in various fields

Objective.Description: The objective of this project is to develop a centralized platform for publishing and sharing research papers, ensuring authenticity, and facilitating collaboration among researchers.
Goals: Create a centralized platform for publishing and sharing research papers
Ensure authenticity and accuracy of published papers

Decider.Name: CV. Git Publication
Decider.Guidelines: Decides on key project decisions, such as prioritization, resource allocation, and public relations

Accountable.Name: Git Publication Team
Accountable.Guidelines: Oversees the project, ensures tasks are completed on time, and reports to the Decider

Academics

Success Metrics.Definition: The percentage of published papers that are verified to be accurate and authentic
The percentage of users who are satisfied with the platform and its features
The percentage of time the platform is available and operational

User Stories.Title: Dataset Access
User Stories.User Story: As a researcher, I want to access a comprehensive dataset of images for training purposes
Acceptance Criteria: Given I have registered on the platform, When I explore the dataset, Then I should find a diverse collection of images
Given I have searched for specific images, When I filter the results, Then I should find relevant images

User Stories.Title: Paper Submission
User Stories.User Story: As a researcher, I want to submit my paper for review and publication
Acceptance Criteria: Given I have registered on the platform, When I submit my paper, Then I should receive a confirmation email
Given I have submitted my paper, When the review process is complete, Then I should receive a response on the review outcome

User Stories.Title: Collaboration Tools
User Stories.User Story: As a researcher, I want to collaborate with other researchers on my paper
Acceptance Criteria: Given I have registered on the platform, When I invite a collaborator, Then I should receive a notification
Given I have invited a collaborator, When we work on the paper together, Then we should be able to track changes and revisions
